item.title: 【SD】Michael Jackson - Bad ("High Quality Processing")
item.description:
Extracted from "Video Greatest Hits DVD", Processed trough AviSynth+

AviSynth+ Code:

Code:
MPEG2Source("Video Greatest Hits History.d2v")
QTGMC(preset="Placebo", Tuning="DV-SD", NoisePreset="Slower", FPSDivisor=2, StabilizeNoise=true, Sharpness=0, Denoiser="dfttest")
tdecimate()
trim(53940,77515)
AudioDub(WAVSource("bad_audio.wav"))
RoboCrop()
PSharpen(35,100,dest_x=720,dest_y=480) #Resize back to 720x480 using sharp scaling


Code:
